General.Name: Forward Partners Group PLC
General.Description: Forward Partners Group Plc is venture capital firm specializing in investments in pre-seed, early seed to late seed stage, start-ups, early stage, growth capital investments and follow-on rounds up to series A. The firm seeks to invest in technology and e-commerce companies which are in initial stages of operations, online marketplaces, B2B, and applied artificial intelligence. It also prefers to invest in fintech sector. It seeks to invest in companies in United Kingdom and Europe. For Pre-seed funding firm prefer to invest £0.2 million ($0.24 million) to £1 million ($1.18 million) and for Seed funding it prefers to invest £0.3 million ($0.35 million) to £2 million ($2.36 million). Forward Partners Group Plc was founded in June 2013 and is based in London, United Kingdom.
General.Address: Commercial Unit 2, London, United Kingdom, N1 6FD
